services.name: Collagen Glow Facial
services.description: Boost your skin's collagen production for firmer, plumper skin. Anti-aging treatment that restores youthful radiance.
services.fullDescription:
This special skincare spa treatment uses collagen protein molecules to revitalize skin. The collagen molecules penetrate into your skin to retard ageing, recover loss of firmness/elasticity, even color tone, enhance moisture level, oxygenate, oxidize and protect natural skin collagen.

After massage your face we will exfoliate your face with a highest concentration of collagen, and followed by a galvanic treatment waves to let the product act deeper into the surface.

As we age, our body is unable to establish an appropriate production of collagen and begins to experience a severe lack of moisture retention. This causes our skin to show signs of dryness, fatigue and wrinkles. Pure freeze dried collagen fibers which are easily absorbed by the skin, provide a boost of hydration, plumps fine lines and wrinkles, calms and soothes irritation and restores skin's vitality and youthful appearance.

services.name: Micro-Needling
services.description: Advanced collagen induction therapy using micro-needles. Dramatically improves scars, wrinkles, and overall skin texture.
services.fullDescription:
Micro-needling is a cutting-edge skincare technology used to stimulate skin's collagen and elastin production. Micro-needling corrects acne scars, fine lines, hyperpigmentation, pore size, and sagging skin.

Micro Needling is performed in a safe and precise manner with the use of a sterile, disposable tip that is discarded after every patient. Prior to the procedure, a topical anesthetic cream is applied for your comfort.

The basic micro-needling treatment includes the application of healing gels and serums during and after the procedure. New healthy skin appears about 4 weeks after treatment and can last up to two years.

Benefits of Micro-Needling:
• Fine lines and wrinkles are softened
• Skin is thickened, tightened and elasticity restored
• Acne scarring and minor scarring are reduced
• Pigmentation marks are lightened
• Stretch marks are improved
• The disappearance of dilated blood vessels is encouraged
• The healing period is minimal (redness for +/- half a day)
• Procedure is cost-effective
• The process is suited to all skin types (including laser-resurfaced skin)
• No permanent damage is caused
• Safely repeatable for maximum results
• No sun-sensitivity is induced
• All areas of the face, neck, and body can be treated
